reviews.sentence: Great Find in Miami. This hotel is right by the water at a price that can not be beat. I think it has everything you need and would more than suffice. The bed was comfortable staff was great and it is along the water. Better than you would think and includes breakfast.

dondane Canada. Great stay. Kids and I went for mini vacation of 4 nights and everything was wonderful. Polite and efficient staff. Room was spotless. Love the pool overlooking the bay. Music playing by the pool made for a great atmosphere. Really good food at the restaurant. Nice to get take out and eat by the pool while you watch the boats. If I could change anything it would be the price of the food. Good food especially the key lime but quite expensive. Wished the windows in the room opened so you do not have to use the A C all the time. Overall wonderful.

3day trip away. This is a motel style hotel that is somewhat dated. However despite the room needing a makeover it was clean and comfortable. Hotel is well located and free parking is a bonus. Has a free buffet style breakfast but it is a bit low quality. The real bonus is the waterfront location and the excellent Shuckers restaurant that does great top notch food both eat in and take out. All in all a reasonable hotel and a decent price. It could do with a facelift but serves me well for seeing Miami the Everglades and the Keys.

Central location. this was a comfortable hotel that is reasonaly priced. It is close to everything and can get north and south quickly. Rooms are a little small but everything went smoothly. Would stay here again no problem. Dogface Jax Fl.
Was under construction while I was there however everything else about it was comfortable. Great views. Decent restaurant attached. Great room for the price.
nice hotel on the bay great views helpful staff. good rates for a hotel that s offers loads.

Far from European standards. After spending 13 hours on the bus not good idea. we could not wait to get some rest. checked in by not very friendly reception staff. We booked friends and family rate as we work in BW as well. they asked for proof that we really work in BW and our business cards were not enough for them. so we spent half an hour on the phone to call back to england to send us a special letter. room itself was ok. everything u need. Our room was in another building no porterage offered. We had to pay for the room straight away no problem but they charged extra 100 in case we smoke in the room or bring pets. It took almost months for money to come back to my account. Morning breakfast was horrible. plastic plates cups cutlery waiting for ages for the table. buffet always emptyone waitress for a lot of people. I would not stay again.

Decent. Location is a bit far from the beach or local attractions. There is a restaurant attached to the hotel a pizza place and a small restaurant across the street about a block away. The room was decent for the price.

Beautiful pool nice view great breakfast and very clean rooms. The pool was big clean and with a wonderful view of the ocean. There is pool bar that sells good food including veggie burgers at a reasonable price. My only critic is that they automatically add 18 tips to your bill even if you buy a couple of meals only. A bird stole a piece of my bun as soon as the plate was set on the table and the brought me another burger without any charge. The breakfast is very complete it has cereal yogurt pancakes eggs fruits etc. The rooms were big and very clean. We stayed only two nights but we rented three rooms and were a total of 11 people. None of us had anything bad to say about this hotel and I have to say that there is picky people in my family.

30th Bday Celebration. The lady during breakfast waited for me and my fiancé to come every morning to take our order. Everyone was for the most part super friendly. That I was not made aware of charges for my fiancés medical supplies being held when I called and they said they could be shipped there no one ever said there was a limit or a fee. There was one male supervisor who was not so pleasant.

good location. Got this BW for a good price considering the location. It reminds me of an old motor inn that has been converted. They are doing construction to update it and thought it was a good value for what we paid. The pool area is nice and good eats nearby. We ate at Ogi Ristorante and it was excellent. I had a groupon for it and the pasta is fresh absolutely amazing food. Our room had 2 beds and a pull out sofa which accommodated our family of 5 perfectly. I would stay again if the price was right.

All in all solid stay. Spent lots of time reading reviews and agonizing over where to stay as a first timer in Miami. did not want the craziness of SoBe and needed parking for our rental car. We wanted to be within walking distance to Collins and Lincoln or so we thought. After realizing that we had have to pay a fortune to park our rental car and pay high room fees we decided to look further out and found the Best Western. Good rates and 10 parking. The hotel is trying to update and they have done a good job in the lobby. Staff were friendly and helpful. The room was sort of updated carpet tile fixtures etc. The beds were only full size and semi comfortable. AC blasted loudly all night. Which probably kept us from hearing any outside noise so that was actually ok. there is a restaurant in the hotel on the water side. it is called Shuckers. I will review it separately but I can tell you not to waste your time and money. Use the free drink coupons from the hotel you get two for each day and GTFOT. The hotel is on the bay which is really cool and makes it centrally located. Uber was 15 down to SoBe. We drove to Mid Beach one morning. it is around 36th street and scored on street parking. Just have to get there early which in Miami is anytime before 1030am lol. We used the pool overlooking the bay. It was great. Just turned the sun chairs around and enjoyed the view of the bay. Facing the other direction was not as pleasant. that is all I am gon na say about that Would we stay there again. Yes. Will we go to Miami again. No.

Great location comfy rooms and nice staff only drawback is the mandatory parking fee but that is pretty ubiquitous in these parts of Miami. Thought about doing the cool speedboat tour but it was pretty pricey.

Nice hotel near the beach. Nice hotel near the beach and it is by the ocean with nice view. There is a pool inside which is nice too. One con is there is no complimentary breakfast as other best western hotels and the buffet breakfast there costs 16 per person. There is a 10 parking.

OK would not stay again. Entrance of the hotel is nice and modern and i had high hopes for the rooms also. Unfortunately it did not live up to expectation room was clean but very tired. Balcony door was a nightmare to open and close and very little day light opposite a high rise building. Staff were very warm and friendly on arrival however they did not want to answer any further questions beyond that first interaction. A deposit was taken from the card i held the room on AND my card i presented at check in. At no point was i advised of the double charge or else i would have remained with the original. When i asked reception why they requested the money twice i got very vague answers and a stroppy attitude. Needless to say calling my bank to release the funds back to me was the last thing i wanted to be doing on holiday and after a 10 hour flight. Location is OK basically thank god for uber pool. This saved us substantially on taxi costs to the touristy areas of the city. Time to places like bayside is roughly 20 30 mins. Thankfully we only stayed here for 3 nights and it was a stop en route to another location. I would not personally recommend this hotel for tourists looking to visit and experience Miami. I have been lucky enough to visit Miami a number of times and there are definitely better hotels locations to choose from.

Stayed a week in this lovely hotel in 201. The service was great and the staff were helpful. I damaged one wall in my room and they fixed it for free without any charges. Plenty of trips are available as well from the reception.

Cost effective stop over. Stopped here last month as a touch down in Miami heading elsewhere. Chose it due to the location to the water and to the town Winwod. The hotel staff were very helpful and polite. The room was as expected at this price point large enough for 2 with luggage and the usual amenities. The room was clean and comfortable. On site they have a small pool and a sun deck overlooking the water. All was clean but the pool is not heated so be brave in January. Small breakfast facilities are on the 2nd floor nice staff and clean and tidy. Price for breakfast does not compare to an iHop though.

Stay away from their breakfast or front desk. Breakfast is a rip off unles it is included in your stay. Service is terrible the food is worse and no matter what they will get theirs as tip is included in the inflated price. The front desk send you fishing when you ask for change to do laundry at their coin laundry facility and pools towels seem to be a luxury too fancy for this location. The entire place needs a facelift.
